name: 07 - Electron Racing
description:
Ever wished to be an Electron, running through a cable?
THIS IS YOUR CHANCE!!! 

Theme 07 of the GAME A WEEK Course of the University of Applied Sciences Europes - Local Multiplayer. 

--- 
IMPORTANT NOTE:
Please connect your controllers FIRST before starting the Game.
Thank you! 
---

So basically you´re an Electron and this Game is a local Multiplayer, only playable with Xbox/PS4 Controllers. You have some amount of Charge, if you loose all the charge, you loose. But not if you loose your charge as the last person. 
Simple Racing Game, just in a cable... 
---
Idea and Programming by Jörg Sroka 
Design by Hannah Pollow
